rules_text:
At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Keine.
{1}, Exile a card from your graveyard: Scry 1.
rules_text2:
Trample
Whenever Keine transforms into Keine, Were-Hakutaku, put the bottom three cards of your library into your graveyard. You may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Keine.
